citadels

Class AppTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • citadels.app.AppTest

  • public class AppTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Test cases for district card parsing and districtDeck building.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AppTest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<DistrictCard> createTestDistrictCards() 
      void testBuildDistrictDeck()
      This test checks that the district districtDeck is built with 79 cards after expanding by quantity, matching the sum of all card quantities.
      void testCharacterDeckShuffleAndDraw() 
      void testCharacterSelectionOrder() 
      void testCreateCharacterCards() 
      void testDeckContainsOnlyValidCards()
      This test checks that every card in the districtDeck matches a valid card name from the loaded district card types.
      void testDeckSizeAfterDealing()
      This test checks that the districtDeck size decreases by the total cards dealt to all players.
      void testDiscardCountsFor4Players() 
      void testInitialGoldAndCards()
      This test checks that each player starts with exactly 2 gold and 4 cards in hand.
      void testKingNotDiscardedFaceUp() 
      void testLoadDistrictCards()
      This test checks that the parser loads exactly 41 unique district card types from cards.tsv, as expected for the supplied resource file.
      void testPlayerInitialization()
      This test checks that the correct number of players are created, with one human and the rest AI.
      void testTavernQuantityInDeck()
      This test checks that the Tavern card appears exactly 5 times in the districtDeck, matching its quantity in cards.tsv.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
